revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Items]][[Category:Housing]]
[[File:Housing_Butler_Increase_Deed_Preview.PNG|thumb|This is a special deed that will increase the number of Butlers that your current home can hold.]]

__TOC__
=Description=
This is a special deed that can be used to increase a home's maximum number of [[Butler|Butlers]] by one, up to 10 total butlers in a home! 

==Patch Notes==
* [https://www.uoforum.com/threads/new-quality-of-life-items.110193/ New Quality of Life Items!]

=Using the Deed=
In order to use the deed you must be in a home that you are co-owned, bi-owned, or are the owner of the home. When you double click the deed in a valid home with a valid character you will receive the message:

[[File:Butler_Increase_Deed_Increase_Message.PNG|The message of a successful increase in the number of Butlers that can be in a home when using the Butlers Increase Deed.]]

You can continue to use these Butlers Increase Deeds until you reach a maximum of 10 where you will receive this message:

[[File:Butler_Increase_Deed_Maximum_Message.PNG|The message when you have reached the most number of maximum butlers in your home when using a Butlers Increase Deed.]]

You can see the current maximum number of [[Butler|Butlers]] in your home from the House sign Menu under "Storage":

[[File:Butler_Increase_Deed_House_Sign_Count.PNG|The House Sign Menu's Storage selection where you can see the current and maximum number of Butlers a home can have.]]

=Located=
The Butlers Increase Deed is purchasable with [[Donation_Coin|10000 Donation Coins]] from [[Exotic_Item_Vendor|Nadine the Exotic Item Donation Vendor]] located in front of the [[Britain|West Britain Bank]].

[[File:Butler_Increase_Deed_Location.PNG|The Butlers Increase Deed will increase your homes maximum butler count by 1 up to a maximum of 10 Butlers.]]
